definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)

sentences.english: Simple buttstock is made from steel wire and folds to the left side of gun.
sentences.chinese: 簡單的槍托是由鋼絲和褶皺的槍的左側。
可是，安德烈迅速地用槍托將傑克打倒。

sentences.english: When the butt was removed the face flopped back over to the left.
sentences.chinese: 當槍托一拿掉，他的臉又重新撲落到左邊。

sentences.english: Troops used tear gas and rifle butts to break up the protests.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊使用催淚瓦斯和槍托驅散示威者。

sentences.english: Detachable shoulder stocks are prohibited in IPSC competition.
sentences.chinese: 在IPSC的競賽中，可分離式的槍托是被禁止的。
